# Vue Loader #

## Installation ##

```bash
npm install --save  "@imarcom/vue-loader"
```

or 

```bash
yarn add "@imarcom/vue-loader"
```

## Usage ##
ES6
```js
import { VueLoader } from '@imarcom/vue-loader';

new Vue({
    components: {
        VueLoader
    }
});
```

## Props ##
- ***size*** Size of the loader
   - medium (default)
   - small
- ***type*** Type of loader
   - circle (default)
   - cubes
   - bounces
- ***theme*** Theme of the loader
   - gray (default)   
   - light
   - dark
